[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.

English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

label: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
predictions: Em i tok moa olsem, "Nau yumi gat ol liklik rat i gat 4-pela mun we ol i no gat sik suka nau, bipo ol i bin gat sik suka."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol samting i gat wanwan eria bilong stadi bilong ol yet, na i lukluk long ol rot bilong givim ol ansa long ol problem we i save kamap long olgeta de.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
predictions: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, Nova Scotia na em i hetman bilong 'clinical and scientific division' bilong 'Canadian Diabetes Association', i givim tok lukaut olsem risets i stap yet long ol bikpela de bilong en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Long ol Springboks, em i pinis bilong 5-pela gem we ol i lus i kam inap nau.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).

label: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
predictions: Olsem sampela arapela save man, em i gat tupela tingting long sait bilong oraitim sik suka, na em i tok olsem ol dispela painim i no gat as bilong helpim ol manmeri husat i gat sik suka namba 1 pinis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.

Tok Pisin: Bipo, i no olgeta Sámi i bin stap insait long wok bilong lukautim planti lain 'reindeer', tasol ol i stap long painim pis, painim abus na kain olsem, planti bilong ol i save gat 'reindeer' bilong karim kago.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.

label: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.
predictions: Long Mande, Sara Danius, sekreteri i stap oltaim bilong Nobel Komiti bilong Literatura long Swedish Academy, em i tokaut long pablik insait long wanpela redio program long Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem komiti, ol i no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan stret long winim 2016 Nobel Prize long Literatura, ol i lusim pinis wok bilong traim long painim em.

English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.

English: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
Tok Pisin: Polis i tok ol i saspek olsem wanpela soldia bilong Daesh (ISIL) i kamapim dispela hevi.
English: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
Tok Pisin: Ol atoriti i ting olsem dispela i soim olsem ol dispela kontena we i holim 'uranium' long dispela senta i mas bruk na i wok long lik (leak).
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.

Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.

Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.

Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Tok Pisin: NextGen em i wanpela sistem we FAA i tok olsem em bai larim ol balus long flai long ol sotpela rot na seivim (save) planti milien galen (gallon) bilong 'fuel' long olgeta yia na daunim mak bilong 'carbon' we i save go long 'air'.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

predictions: Siminoff i tok salim i go antap bihain long em i kamap long wanpela episod bilong Shark Tank long 2013 we ol memba bilong so i no laik givim mani long statim bisnis.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).

Tok Pisin: Robin Uthappa i mekim nambawan sko (score) we i winim olgeta bikpela sko bilong dispela 'inning', em i mekim 70-pela 'runs' long 41-pela bal tasol taim em i paitim bal long mak bilong 11-pela foa na 2-pela siks.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
Tok Pisin: Traim long swim i go long wanpela hap we 'current' i no pulim bek gen o, bihainim mak bilong yu long swim na saposl i gat lain i lukim yu, yu ken tingting long wet long ol lain i ken seivim (save) yu.

Tok Pisin: Cuomo, husat i gat 53 krismas, i statim wok bilong em olsem gavana long stat bilong dispela yia na i sainim wanpela 'bill' long mun i go pinis we i mekim lo i tok orait long man i maritim man yet na meri i maritim meri yet.
English: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri i save kukim kaikai autsait long sait bilong haus; ol stoa em ol tebol we i op na i lukluk i go long rot. Ol i save yusim ol ston long bildim ol haus.

Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.

Tok Pisin: Siti bilong Casablanca long tude em ol man Berber we i save painim pis i kamapim long '10th century' BCE, na ol Phoenicians, Romans, na Merenid i bin yusim olsem wanpela impoten port we ol i kolim Anfa.
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.

English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.

English: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
Tok Pisin: Ol laion, 'cheetah' na 'leopard' em sampela taim ol i save sem long kam ples klia na yu bai lukim ol gut taim yu yusim ol 'binoculars'.

Tok Pisin: Long 1976, teti pesen (percent) bilong Machu Picchu em ol i bin bildim bek gen na ol i wok long stretim yet i kam inap tude.

predictions: Tupela singsing long dispela muvi, Audition (Ol Fuls Husat i Driman) na City of Stars, i kisim neminesen bilong best original song. Lionsgate studio i kisim 26 neminesen — planti moa winim ol narapela studio.

Tok Pisin: Yu ken i gat ol 'alloy' we i gat ol liklik mak bilong ol elemen (element) we i no metel (metal) kain olsem 'carbon' insait long ol.

English: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.

English: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.

English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
Tok Pisin: Finland em i wanpela gutpela kantri bilong raun long bot. Dispela "'Ples bilong tausen raunwara'" i gat planti tausen ailen insait long ol raunwara na long ol solwara.
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
Tok Pisin: Pret bilong no gat trenspot (transport) i mekim na i luk olsem dispela geim (game) em ol bai i pilai insait long wanpela hap we i no gat sapota i ken i go.
English: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela taim, ol i kisim dispela nem 'Fashion Capital' long siti Constantinople na givim i go long siti Paris.
English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
Tok Pisin: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Sampela milien 'vials' bilong 'encephalitis' sut marasin em gavman i bin promis long givim, dispela bai redim ol helt ejensi (agency) long mekim wok long nupela yia i kam.
predictions: Gavman i promis long givim planti milion vail bilong tisap long het (encephalitis vaccine) tu, bai ol i ken redim ol helt agensi bilong redi long neks yia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long autsait i tok olsem olgeta dispela samting na sampela moa i soim Ontario olsem em i ples we i soim tru tru kala bilong Canada.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Tok Pisin: 'Light pollution' i no bin wanpela problem long mak we em i stap long en tude, ol i save stap long ol siti o long ol skul, na i isi long go long en na i no olsem ol dispela we ol i bildim long tude.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.

Tok Pisin: Ol tingting i stap long dispela tok save em ol i raitim hariap, i no gat planti infomesen na ol i mekim ol samting i kamap olsem i no gat planti samting i stap insait long en sapos yu skelim wantaim ol infomesen i stap long narapela hap.
English: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
Tok Pisin: Lokel 'telephone service provider' bilong yu bai inap long givim moa infomesen long yu long hau yu ken konekt long dispela sevis.
English: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
Tok Pisin: Planti bikpela televisen skrin (screen) em ol i bin putim long ol wanwan ples long Roma bai ol manmeri i ken lukim dispela funerel.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.
English: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
Tok Pisin: Taim planti manmeri i gat kar, planti eksiden i ken kamap long ol rot, dispela bai i mekim na ol lain bai i kamapim ol nupela teknik insait long heltkea long stretim ol bagarap long bodi.
English: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti nambis, bikos Auckland i gat tupela basis i stap sait sait bilong em. Ol gutpela nambis we planti lain i save laikim i stap long tripela eria.
English: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel, ol sitisen bilong America long Middle East em ol bai i stap long narapela we long ol lain long Europe na ol Arab.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.
English: The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sultan' bilong Morocco i bildim dispela siti gen olsem Daru l-Badya na ol treida (trader) bilong Spain i kolim em olsem Casablanca taim ol i mekim ol senta bilong ol long hap.
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).
English: Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco.
Tok Pisin: Insait long olgeta hap bilong Casablanca em i wanpela bilong ol ples we i no gat gutpela hap bilong baim ol samting.

label: Wok bilong em i gat gutpela kwaliti we planti laini luksave long en na we em i save mekim ol wanwan liklik samting em i narakain tru we wanwan "lain we i gat nem bilong mekim dispela wok" namel long ol 'philatelist'. Sampela i 'specialize' long sait bilong kolektim ol wok bilong em tasol.
predictions: Wok bilong en i gat biknem long kwaliti na pasin bilong lukluk gut long ol liklik samting, olsem na em i stap olsem wanpela bilong ol liklik namba bilong ol "nem bilong ol haus lain" insait long ol man i save bungim ol stamp. Sampela i save spesel long bungim wok bilong em tasol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material.
Tok Pisin: 'Experiment' bilong Hershey and Chase em i wanpela bilong ol samting we i tok olsem DNA em i wanpela 'genetic material'.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.
English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol nupela teknoloji we i kamap i helpim mipela long lukim na mekim investigesen long ol straksa (structure) na proses (process) bilong brein (brain) we mipela i no bin lukim bipo.
English: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
Tok Pisin: Sikret (secret) bilong hau ol i save stap gut em i dispela samting ol i kolim 'niche', wanpela spesol wok wanwan pusi i save mekim na em i no resis wantaim narapela.
English: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save givim moa 'stability' long 'rider', tasol ol i ken kamapim hevi long sait bilong sefti bikos nogut lek bilong 'rider' i pas insait long ol.

predictions: Stamp namba 1,000 bilong em em i naispela "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" bilong David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl long yia 2000, em Guinness Book of World Records i bin raitim nem bilong en.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long histori i tok agensim ol polisi bilong FBI we i putim ol 'risos' long ol 'case' we i isi long stretim, bikpela moa em long sait bilong ol kar we ol lain i bin stilim, long wanem ol i laik mekim mak bilong FBI long stretim ol 'case' i go antap.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.

English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol ples we i save givim ol fri dring we i gat 'alcohol' insait long en. Tasol, taim man i spak em i no inap long skelim gut samting, na olgeta gutpela man bilong 'gamble' i save olsem em i impoten long tingting bilong ol i mas stap stret.
English: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.

English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.

English: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
Tok Pisin: Perian tok ples em i isi na grama (grammar) bilong em i isi long bihainim.
English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
Tok Pisin: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em Netherlands, wantaim Anna Jochemsen we i pinis long namba nain ples long 'women's standing class' insait long Super-G long aste, na Finland wantaim Katja Saarinen we i pinis namba ten insait long dispela seim (same) geim (game).

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long Norway, Sweden na New Zealand, tasol em i narakain liklik (eksampel long Netherlands, dispela namba em i 40).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
Tok Pisin: Risets i bin painimaut olsem sans bilong ol meri long kisim MS em i tupela taim moa long ol man.
English: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
Tok Pisin: South Africa em i nambawan tim insait long dispela tonamen (tournament) na em i stat gut taim em i winim tim bilong Zambia we i stap namba 5 insait long tonamen 26 - 00.
English: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela marit i ken mekim disisen olsem em i no gutpela long ol, ol em i no gutpela long pikinini bilong ol, sapos ol i gat wanpela bebi.
English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.

Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, sampela 'saddle', dispela em ol English 'saddle', ol i gat ol 'safety bar' we i save larim 'stirrup leather' i pundaun i go daun long 'saddle' sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun i go baksait.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.

Tok Pisin: Taim ol i bin mekim wanpela test we ol i kolim PALM, ZMapp i stap olsem wanpela 'control', dispela em i min olsem ol saintis i yusim em olsem wanpela 'baseline' na i skelim wanem we ol narapela tritmen i wok bihainim em.

Tok Pisin: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.

Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman i tok: "Angola i wok long go long mak we i nogut tru long dispela 'outbreak' na dispela hevi em i stap nogut tru long Angola," em i tok.

English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
Tok Pisin: Long ol sampela bikde, bikpela namba bilong ol lain i save pilai musik i mekim kem long dispela ples, na planti bilong ol i save pilim olsem dispela em i impoten hap bilong dispela ekspiriens.
English: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
Tok Pisin: Yumi save mekim ol haus bilong yumi long ol plent (plant) na yumi save mekim ol klos bilong yumi long ol plent. Planti bilong ol kaikai we yumi save kaikai em ol plent. Sapos no gat plent, ol animal bai i no inap long stap laip.
English: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
Tok Pisin: Klostu long pinis bilong yia 2017, Siminoff i kamap long QVC, wanpela televisen 'channel' bilong salim samting,
English: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Ring i bin givim mani long wanpela sekuriti kampani, ADT Corporation, we i bin laik kisim em i go long kot.

English: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Mi save pilim sampela samting olgeta taim mipela i save mekim prektis long dispela, mi save pilim insait long lewa bilong mi.
predictions: Mi pilim tru insait long bel bilong mi long olgeta taim yumi mekim ripitisan long dispela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
Tok Pisin: Em i tok moa olsem "ol i mas no ken askim ol long mekim ol wok we i antap moa long mak bilong divelopmen we ol i stap long em, mak bilong wok ol inap long mekim, na mak bilong save ol i gat."
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
Tok Pisin: Bikos i no gat bekim i kamap long dispela 'tactic', Germany i ting olsem wankain samting bai i kamap long ol 'submarine' bilong em.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
English: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
Tok Pisin: Samting we dispela tim i wok long painim em ol fos bilong tait namel long 'dark matter' bilong dispela 'galaxy' na 'dark matter' bilong Milky Way 'galaxy' i kamapim.

label: Long kain olsem 3-pela minit long taim ol i salim em i go long 'space', wanpela kamera we i stap long em i soim olsem kainkain hap bilong 'insulation foam' i wok long bruk long 'fuel tank'.
predictions: Klostu 3 minit bihain long ol i statim roket, wanpela kamera long sip i soim planti hap insulesen 'foam' i bruk lus long 'fuel tank'.

Tok Pisin: Tude, Timbuktu em i wanpela taun we i no gat planti samting, maski em i gat gutpela nem we i save pulim ol turis, na em i gat wanpela eapot.

Tok Pisin: Hamilton i tokaut olsem tru tru Howard University Hospital i kisim dispela sikman na em i stap long gutpela kondisen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, taim yu go lukim ol kasol (castle) insait long Loire Valley, Rhine valley o kisim wanpela ‘cruise’ i go long ol naispela siti long Danube o ‘boating’ long Erie Canal.
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
Tok Pisin: Ol blog i ken kisim helpim sumatin long rait gut. Planti taim ol sumatin i statim blog bilong ol wantaim 'grammar' na 'spelling' we i no gutpela, na taim i gat lain bai i ritim ol bai i senis na i rait gut moa.
English: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
Tok Pisin: Bihain, ol i senisim ol plang wil wantaim ain wil. Long 1767, ol i wokim ol namba wan 'full-iron rails'.
English: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
Tok Pisin: Dispela taim we ol samting i kamap em ol i save kolim olsem High Middle Ages dispela taim insait long histori bilong Europe long 11th, 12th na '13th century' (AD 1000–1300).
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Tok Pisin: Sampela 'atom' i gat 'unstable nuclei' na dispela em i min olsem ol i save bruk taim yu tasim liklik o i no tasim.

predictions: Sif bilong NASA shuttle program N. Wayne Hale Jr. i tok dispela 'foam' i pundaun "bihain long taim we mipela i wari long en."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.
Tok Pisin: Ol i yusim ol 'crossties' pastaim long holim ol dispela 'track' i stap long wanpela ples. Bihain, nau, ol i luksave olsem ol dispela 'track' bai kamap gutpela moa sapos ol i gat wanpela hap ain i stap antap long ol.
English: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i ples we ol 'coloniser' bilong British i bin kisim olsem bilong ol olsem na sapos yu laik lukim ol samting we i soim sain bilong ol 'coloniser' long bipo, dispela em i gutpela ples long stat.
English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.

Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Bush Gordon Johndroe i tok olsem 'pledge' bilong North Korea em i "wanpela bikpela samting we i kontribut i go long as tingting bilong kisim 'verifiable denuclearization' bilong 'peninsula' bilong Korea."

label: Faivepela minit bilong dispela 'display' na wanpela win i stat long blo, wanpela minit bihain, dispela win i kamap long mak bilong 70km/h... orait ren i kam, tasol em i pundaun strong nogut tru na sais bilong em i bikpela tru na em i paitim skin bilong yu olsem wanpela nidel (needle), orait bihain ais i pundaun olsem ston long skai, ol manmeri i pret na singaut na ran antap long wanpela narapela.

Tok Pisin: 'Mutation' i save mekim nupela 'genetic variation' i kamap, na 'selection' i save rausim em long 'pool' bilong 'expressed variation'.
English: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed.

Tok Pisin: Taim bilong Huhne na Pryce long kamap long Westminster Magistrates Court em long Febueri 16.

Tok Pisin: Em i klia tru olsem, sapos yu save long wanpela Romance tok ples, em bai isi moa long yu long lainim Portuguese.

Tok Pisin: Em i tok moa olsem "ol i mas no ken askim ol long mekim ol wok we i antap moa long mak bilong divelopmen we ol i stap long em, mak bilong wok ol inap long mekim, na mak bilong save ol i gat."

English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Tok Pisin: Maus bilong em i gat moa long 70-pela tit we i sap olsem resa, wantaim wanpela narapela lain tit we i stap long ruf bilong maus. Dispela em i min olsem wanem samting em i bungim bai i no inap long ranawe.
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken i gat ol 'alloy' we i gat ol liklik mak bilong ol elemen (element) we i no metel (metal) kain olsem 'carbon' insait long ol.
English: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok, i luk olsem dispela bodi i stap insait long hap long kain olsem wanpela de.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
Tok Pisin: Straksa bilong ol dispela gras bilong pisin i soim olsem wok bilong ol em i no bilong flai tasol em i bilong mekim tempritsa (temperature) bilong bodi bilong ol i stap gut na bilong soim kala bilong ol long ol narapela. Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
predictions: Ol lain risets bilong Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i ripot olsem dispela nupela spisis i kamap long tupela genereisen tasol, maski bipo ol i bin ting dispela proses bai tekim longpela taim, long wanem, em i kamap long maritim (breeding) namel long wanpela 'Darwin finch' i stap long hap tasol, Geospiza fortes, na wanpela 'cactus finch' i kam insait, Geospiza conirostris.

English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.

English: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
Tok Pisin: Em i wokim wanpela WiFi belo bilong dua, em i tok.
English: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem sampela bilong ol sikmanmeri i bin kisim dispela binatang long haus sik, Dr, Moll i ting olsem, na tupela bilong ol lain em ol wokmanmeri bilong haus sik.

English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Antap bilong Moon em i gat ol ston na das (dust). 'Outer layer' bilong Moon em ol i kolim 'crust'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.

Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.

English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.

English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.
Tok Pisin: Ol sak i stap, tasol i no save kaikai man. Planti bilong ol sak i save pret long manmeri na i save swim i go longwe.

English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.

predictions: Yumi ken stat long stap moa pasin pren wantaim envairomen, yumi ken joinim wok bilong lukautim envairomen, na yumi ken tu kamap ol aktivis bilong helpim long daunim pen na hevi bilong bihain liklik.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Vatican City em ol i Roman Catholic.
English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol ples we i save givim ol fri dring we i gat 'alcohol' insait long en. Tasol, taim man i spak em i no inap long skelim gut samting, na olgeta gutpela man bilong 'gamble' i save olsem em i impoten long tingting bilong ol i mas stap stret.

Tok Pisin: Long ol rijen insait long Northern India na Pakistan, ol i save yusim 'yogurt' insait long ol 'curry'; long Southern India na sampela 'coastal' rijen bilong dispela ples, ol i save yusim milk bilong kokonas.

Tok Pisin: 'Blogging' em i wanpela tul (tool) we i save mekim ol lain i wok wantaim, na i strongim ol sumating long surikim samting ol i lainim i go autsait moa long wanem samting ol i save lainim long wanpela de insait long skul.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting bilong skelim insait long populesen we i mekim planti lain i kirap nogut: I gat moa African American i stap long US winim namba bilong olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Canada.
English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'case' we ol i saspekim H5N1 long Croatia na Denmark em ol i no painimaut yet olsem ol i tru tru, o nogat.
English: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
Tok Pisin: Tasol Prime Minister John Howard i bin tok olsem dispela pasim em i wanpela rot tasol bilong banisim ol bilding na masin bilong dispela haus sik bai gavman bilong Tasmania i no ken mekim level bilong haus sik i go daun, olsem na em i givim dispela narapela AUD$45 milien.
English: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
Tok Pisin: Taiga em i stap insait long seim (same) grup (Genus Panthera) olsem ol laion, 'leopards', na 'jaguars'. Ol dispela foapela pusi em ol tasol i ken 'roar'.

English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.
predictions: Em i no stap wanpis tasol, ol wok painimaut, na wanpela eksperimen em i wanpela test ol i yusim long rausim wanpela o sampela long ol tingting i gat sans, askim ol askim, na mekim ol lukluk tu i helpim long stiaim ol wok risos long saitens.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'peacekeepers' bilong UN, husat i bin kam long Haiti bihain long bikpela guria bilong yia 2010, em ol lain i sutim tok long ol olsem ol i mekim dispela sik i go long ol manmeri na dispela sik i stat klostu long kem bilong ol.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta samting insait long Universe em ol i kamap long 'matter'. Olgeta 'matter' i gat ol liklik samting insait long ol we ol i kolim 'atom'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.

English: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
Tok Pisin: Em i save kaikai olgeta samting we i go insait long wara; maski wanpela jaient dainaso kain olsem T. rex bai i no inap long em.
English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
Tok Pisin: Cuomo, husat i gat 53 krismas, i statim wok bilong em olsem gavana long stat bilong dispela yia na i sainim wanpela 'bill' long mun i go pinis we i mekim lo i tok orait long man i maritim man yet na meri i maritim meri yet.
English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta lain i ken kisim 'enlightenment'. Wanpela samting tasol we i sanap namel long dispela as tingting em hevi na 'negativity' bilong yumi yet.
English: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
Tok Pisin: Dispela ministri i autim tingting bilong em taim em i kolim dispela pasin bilong Apple long i no givim ripot hariap olsem "i no gutpela tru."

predictions: Planti taim ol i lukim ol pasin na wok bilong bodi i save hangamap tru long ol bikpela saikol i stap insait long bodi na ol i kamapim ol dispela saikol long rot bilong ol 'biological clocks'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim boda-boda (motobaik teksi) long raun insait long Goma. Lokel prais bilong dispela em i ~500 Congolese Francs long ron long sotpela hap.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.

Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
English: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.
Tok Pisin: 20 pesen (percent) bilong wara we i save kamaut long ol wara bilong plenet (planet) i save kam long Amazon.
English: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, kisim tok save bilong ol atoriti, bihainim olgeta sain, na ritim na bihainim gut ol tok lukaut.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri i bin save long ol bikpela kemikel elemen (chemical element) kain olsem gol, silva, na kopa (copper) long bipo taim, bikos ol i bin painim ol insait long envairomen long 'native form' na em i isi long painim ol wantaim ol tul (tool) bilong bipo.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
English: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults.
Tok Pisin: Long kainkain hap bilong United States of America, i gat kain olsem 400,000 'case' bilong Multiple Sclerosis (MS), mekim em i kamap olsem nambawan 'neurological disease' insait long ol bikpela manmeri.
English: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'scaffold' long komputa em ol i stap insait long ol 'software' na wok bilong ol em long askim kwesten, tok save long wanem samting bilong mekim, na tok klia long ol rot bilong mekim samting we i hat long ol sumatin long mekim long save bilong ol yet.
English: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
Tok Pisin: Em i save kaikai olgeta samting we i go insait long wara; maski wanpela jaient dainaso kain olsem T. rex bai i no inap long em.

English: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
Tok Pisin:"}]

predictions: Ol 'biological clock' em ol i save wok yet long ol yet na bai ol i gohet long mekim ol 'free-running cycle' maski sapos i no gat ol 'external cue'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.

English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
English: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
Tok Pisin: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i sainim wanpela 'bill' na mekim em i kamap olsem lo tru tru we i stopim ol lain long salim o rentim o geim (game) bilong pait i go long ol pikinini.
English: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain olsem foapela 'states of matter' (na i bihainim wankain oda): strong, wara, ges (gas), na 'plasma', em i tok tu olsem ol i senis na kamapim nupela samting long mekim ol samting we yumi i lukim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan namel long 78-pela rekomendesen (recommendation) em i olsem i mas i gat wanpela nupela 'diplomatic initiative' bipo long dispela yia i pinis long mekim ol boda bilong Iraq i stap seif long ol birua na kamapim ol gutpela rilesensip wantaim ol lain i stap klostu long em.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.
English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'case' we ol i saspekim H5N1 long Croatia na Denmark em ol i no painimaut yet olsem ol i tru tru, o nogat.

Tok Pisin: Ol lain long autsait i tok olsem olgeta dispela samting na sampela moa i soim Ontario olsem em i ples we i soim tru tru kala bilong Canada.

Tok Pisin: Long hap not na i stap long ples we isi long go long en em dispela ol i kolim Sintra we i gat histori na i nais tru na planti ol lain long narapela kantri i save long en taim ol ritim toktok bilong Lord Byron long ol naispela samting i stap long em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.

English: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
Tok Pisin: Ol memba bilong wanpela 'subculture' i ken soim olsem ol i memba bilong em taim ol i yusim wanpela kain stail, kain olsem klos ol i werim, pasin ol i gat long en, na toktok ol i yusim.

Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.

Tok Pisin: I no gat as bilong askim long diskaun prais long bisnis klas o namba wan klas long ol 'direct flights', long wanpela ples i go long narapela ples.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.
