English: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.
Tok Pisin: Nau ol manmeri i save raitim ol tok save long ol komputa skrin (computer screen), na ol i no kam klostu long wanpela sapena (sharpener).
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
English: The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa.
Tok Pisin: Dispela siti em i ples bilong i stap long en na klaimim Nyiragongo volkeno wantaim ol lain bilong painim Moutain Gorilla. Prais bilong ol dispela lain bilong painim gorila i orait moa long ol narapela insait long Africa.
English: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela taim, Katolik Sios i bin i gat planti mani na pawa, olsem na ol i skelim em gut tru.
English: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
Tok Pisin: Rom i bin go pas long lukautim wok bilong sios long tausen yia na planti pawa na moni i stap long Rom. Dispela i mekim na planti manmeri i wok long i gat tupela tingting sapos em i inapim dispela bilip, o nogat.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Bikpela Amazon River em i 6,387 km (3,980 miles). Em i save kolektim ol wara i kam long planti tausen liklik wara.
predictions: Bikpela wara Amazon em i gat 6,387 kilomita (3,980 mail). Em i kisim wara long tausen tausen liklik wara.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we i mekim ol 'subculture' i narakain narakain em i ken tok ples, samting we i nais, lotu, politiks, 'sexual', ples, o ol dispela samting i bung wantaim.
English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin ting olsem em i laik resis gen long kamap olsem presiden long 2016.
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.
English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim sip long muvim ol samting em i nambawan we tru bilong muvim bikpela namba bilong ol kago o ol manmeri long solwara.
English: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
Tok Pisin: Long ol sampela bikde, bikpela namba bilong ol lain i save pilai musik i mekim kem long dispela ples, na planti bilong ol i save pilim olsem dispela em i impoten hap bilong dispela ekspiriens.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Maski ol pasin bilong mekim 'pyramid-bilding' long ston em i kontinu (continue) i go inap long pinis bilong Old Kingdom, ol i no winim sais na save bilong ol lain i wokim ol 'pyramid' bilong Giza.
predictions: Maski ol i wokim ol pira mit long ston i go inap long pinis bilong Olpela Kingdom, ol pira mit bilong Giza ol i no inap winim long saiz na gutpela pasin bilong wokim ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
Tok Pisin: Samting bilong Uka long pait i no bin wok taim em i poin i go long het bilong namba faiv man. Schneider isave pilim pen, wansait em bilong em i no inap lukluk, na wanpela hap bilong bun bilong het na pes bilong em ol i wok long 'titanium'.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
English: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela tonamen (tournament) bilong yia i save kamap long Disemba long ol 'polo fields' long Las Cañitas.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Tok Pisin: 34 pesen (percent) bilong ol lain insait long dispela 'poll' i gat dispela tingting, we ol i laik olsem Queen Elizabeth II i mas kamap laspela kwin bilong Australia.
English: Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa.
Tok Pisin: Bikos Montevideo i stap saut long Equator, em i save sama (summer) long hap taim em i winta (winter) long Northern Hemisphere na bihain em i save senis gen.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol lain Egypt bilong New Kingdom i tingting olsem ol dispela bilding bilong ol tumbuna bilong ol em i narakain tru, long dispela taim ol dispela 'pyramid' i gat moa long tausen krismas.
predictions: Ol 'New Kingdom' bilong Ijip i bin kirap nogut long ol monumen bilong ol tumbuna bilong ol, we long dispela taim ol i gat moa long wan tausen yia olpela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
Tok Pisin: I gat 17,000 ailan long makim wanpela long en, kaikai bilong Indonesia em i wanpela bikpela nem we i karampaim ol kainkain kaikai we yu ken painim long olgeta hap bilong Indonesia.
English: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela raun bilong em, Iwasaki i painim trabel planti taim.
English: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wok long traim yet long painimaut mak bilong dispela bikpela paia na em i bin kamapim wanem kain bagarap long Earth.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Tok Pisin: Gol em ol i ken mekim i go kama kainkain seip (shape). Na ol i ken rolim em na kamapim ol liklik liklik seip (shape).
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Populesen (population) bilong Vatican City em i kain olsem 800. Dispela em nambawan liklik kantri tru insait long wol na kantri we i gat liklik populesen tru.
predictions: Populesen bilong Vatican City em i stap klostu long 800. Em i liklik indipenden kantri tru long graun na kantri we i gat liklik populesen tumas.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'vertical clearance' aninit long bris em i 15 mita. Konstraksen (construction) i bin pinis long Ogas 2011, em i no op long ol kar i ron i go inap long Mas 2017.
English: It is still produced today, but more importantly its aspect ratio has been inherited by digital camera image sensor formats.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wokim em yet long tude, tasol impoten moa em i olsem 'aspect ratio' bilong en em ol 'digital camera image senor' fomet (format) i kisim na yusim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Vatican City i save yusim tok ples Italian insait long ol lo bilong em na long mekim ol 'official communication'.
predictions: Vatican City i yusim tok Italian long ol loa bilong en na long ol ofisel toktok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
Tok Pisin: Long wanpela 'route', ol bikpela kampani i gat ol balus bilong ol yet, tasol long ol narapela 'route' na long ol liklik bisnis i bin i gat wanpela problem.
English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tok olsem ol bai i katim em i go daun long Tunde, tasol wanpela imejensi kot 'ruling' i seivim dispela diwai.
English: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
Tok Pisin: Aninit long ol em ol namel sais pusi we i save kaikai ol namel sais abus stat long rebit (rabbit) i go long entelop (antelope) na dia (deer).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
predictions: Itali tokples em tu ol i save yusim long olgeta de insait long wok bilong gavman, na Latin tokples ol i save yusim planti taim long ol lotu seremoni.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri i bin save long ol bikpela kemikel elemen (chemical element) kain olsem gol, silva, na kopa (copper) long bipo taim, bikos ol i bin painim ol insait long envairomen long 'native form' na em i isi long painim ol wantaim ol tul (tool) bilong bipo.
English: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
Tok Pisin: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i sainim wanpela 'bill' na mekim em i kamap olsem lo tru tru we i stopim ol lain long salim o rentim o geim (game) bilong pait i go long ol pikinini.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.
English: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
Tok Pisin: Bihain ol ripot i tok olsem dispela balus i kisim wanpela 'bomb threat' olsem na ol salim em i go bek long Afghanistan, na em i go daun long Kandahar.
English: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol lain i save stap long Bishkek i sutim tok long ol lain i mekim protes (protest) long saut olsem ol i kamapim dispela pasin bilong brukim lo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Vatican City em ol i Roman Catholic.
predictions: Ol sitisen bilong Vatican City ol i Roman Catholic.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela sko (score) em i wanpela poin win, 21 na 20, na i pinisim 15-pela geim (game ) we All Blacks i bin winim.
English: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
Tok Pisin: Arly Velasquez bilong Mexicoi pinis long namba fiftin ples insait long 'men's sitting' long Super-G. Pleiya (player) bilong New Zealand s Adam Hall i pinis long namba nain ples insait long 'men's standing' long Super-G.
English: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em i kam long Chain we ol i save lukluk long ol 'plum blossom'.
English: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela ain i no i stap, o sapos yu no tingting long werim soks we ol i ainim, orait yu ken traim yusim wanpela 'hairdryer', sapos em i stap.
English: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
Tok Pisin: Singa (singer) Sanju Sharma i stat long dispela avinun, na Jai Shankar Choudhary i kam bihain long em. Na tu, Lakkha Singh i mekim singsing chhappan bhog bhajan. Singa, Raju Khandelwal i wok long singsing wantaim em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol manmeri i bin save long ol bikpela kemikel elemen (chemical element) kain olsem gol, silva, na kopa (copper) long bipo taim, bikos ol i bin painim ol insait long envairomen long 'native form' na em i isi long painim ol wantaim ol tul (tool) bilong bipo.
predictions: Ol man i save long ol as bilong kemikol elemen olsem gol, silva, na kopa long taim bipo yet, long wanem, ol dispela i ken kamap long nesere long asples pasin na i isi long kisim olsem long ol primitiv tul.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755.
Tok Pisin: Ol Portuguese i bin bagarapim em na bildim em gen aninit long nem Casa Branca, tasol ol i lusim dispela ples bihain long wanpela guria i kamap long 1755.
English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol metod (method) we planti lain i save yusim long soim olsem 'socialization' em i impoten em ol i save yusim stori bilong ol pikinini we i bin 'socialized' bikos ol papamama i no bisi long ol, ol samting nogut i kamap long laip bilong ol, o ol lain i mekim nogut long ol taim ol i wok long gro.
English: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, planti bilong ol sain i tok long tok ples Catalan tasol bikos lo i tok olsem em i nambawan bikpela tok ples bilong dispela hap.
English: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
Tok Pisin: Nau em i stap long olgeta hap bilong grup ailan, kaikai bilong Java em i gat ol 'seasoned dishes', na namba fleiva bilong kaikai bilong Java em pinat, 'chilie', suga (dispela em kokonas sugar bilong Java) na ol kainkain 'aromatic spices'.
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Aristotle, a philosopher, theorised that everything is made up of a mixture of one or more of four elements. They were earth, water, air, and fire.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Aristotle, wanpela filosofa (philosopher), i kamapim tingting olsem olgeta samting i kamap long ol wanpela o moa bilong ol foapela elemen (elements) i miks wantaim. Ol dispela elemen em graun, wara, win, na paia.
predictions: Aristotle, wanpela man bilong tingting, i gat tingting olsem olgeta samting i kamap long wanpela o moa long fopela element. Ol dispela em graun, wara, win, na paia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, 'still image photography' fomet (format) we planti lain i save long en em i 35mm, we i nambawan sais bilong 'film' bihain long taim bilong 'analog film'.
English: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
Tok Pisin: Komuniti i kros na dispela i kamapim ol wok bilong mekim ol polisi we i toktok long 'sexual content' bilong dispela 'site' we i save i gat milien 'open-licensed media' i yusim.
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Tok Pisin: Long aste avinun, long La Plata, wanpela siti we i stap 50 kilomita (31-pela 'mile') long Buenos Aires, dispela senata (senator) husat em i Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kircher i tokaut olsem em bai i resis long kamap presiden.
English: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
Tok Pisin: Murray i lusim namba wan 'set' bilong em insait long wanpela 'tie breal' taim tupela man wantaim i kisim olgeta 'serve' insait long dispela 'set'.
English: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim dispela em i wankain olsem 'sympomatic treatment'. Tasol, sapos yumi i no laikim wanpela sotpela ansa, orait yumi mas painim as bilong problem, na yumi mas stopim ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela em i wankain olsem foapela 'states of matter' (na i bihainim wankain oda): strong, wara, ges (gas), na 'plasma', em i tok tu olsem ol i senis na kamapim nupela samting long mekim ol samting we yumi i lukim.
predictions: Dispela i moa olsem ol foa 'state' bilong 'matter' (long wankain oda): 'solid', 'liquid', 'gas', na 'plasma', maski em i gat tingting tu olsem ol i senis i go long ol nupela 'substance' bilong kamapim samting yumi lukim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For a comparison of population that surprises many: There are more African Americans living in the US than there are Canadian citizens.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting bilong skelim insait long populesen we i mekim planti lain i kirap nogut: I gat moa African American i stap long US winim namba bilong olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Canada.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
Tok Pisin: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Tok Pisin: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.
English: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
Tok Pisin: Huhne i risain (resign) em Ed Davey MP bai i kisim ples bilong em long Cabinet. Norman Lamb MP bai i kisim wok bilong Business Minister we Davey bai i lusim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.
predictions: Alloi em i stret wanpela miks bilong tupela o moa metal. No ken tingting lus olsem i gat planti elemen long tebol bilong ol period.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela graun i save kamapim ol 'sandbars' na ol nambis, we i save stap olsem ol ples bilong ol kainkain animal bilong bus.
English: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela marasin we ol i wok long testim, em i daunim namba bilong ol manmeri i wok long dai long Ebola. Long dispela taim i kam inap nau, i no gat marasin i soim ples klia olsem em i inap long oraitim dispela sik.
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: Our foster care system is supposed to provide safe homes, loving caregivers, stable education, and reliable health care.

English: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol protes em sampela taim i save kamapim kros na pait na ol i wok long kamap bikos i no gat ileksen i kamap, sampela i sapos long kamap long 2011.
English: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
Tok Pisin: Tripela moa bom i pairap klostu long ol bilding bilong gavman insait long tupela aua.
English: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'atom' em ol i liklik liklik tru na trilien (trillion) bilong ol bai i inap long fit i go inap long wanpela 'full stop' long pinis bilong wanpela sentens (sentence).
English: It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long werim wanpela ring (no ken werim ring we i luk ekspensif).
English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Rilesensip namel long 'brain pathology' na pasin i sapotim ol saintis insait long risets bilong ol.
predictions: Dispela wankain samting namel long sik bilong brapela na pasin em i helpim ol saientis long resis bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok i kisim mining bilong em long Bed-bugs, ol dispela binatang we i save parasait long ol manmeri.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.
English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
Tok Pisin: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.
English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
Tok Pisin: Bipo planti fama (farmer) i save mekim 'subsistence agriculture' na dispela pasin em i stap yet long planti kantri we i no divelop yet.
English: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long Babylon i bildim wanpela namba wan tempel long wanwan god bilong ol we ol i save mekim olsem dispela em i haus bilong dispela god.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i save long longpela taim pinis olsem ol kainkain bagarap i kamap long brein (brain), ol 'trauma', ol 'lesion', na ol 'tumour' i ken mekim pasin i senis na kamapim senis long tingting.
predictions: Em i save longpela taim pinis olsem ol narapela kain bagarap long brain, traumas, soa, na ol tumas i save senisim pasin bilong man na i mekim ol senis long sampela mental function.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
Tok Pisin: Dispela grup ailan i stap 120 km not long Peninsula. Nambawan bikpela ailan em King George Island we i gat ol man i stap long Villa Las Estrellas.
English: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela taim, Katolik Sios i bin i gat planti mani na pawa, olsem na ol i skelim em gut tru.
English: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
Tok Pisin: Kapitol bilong Moldova em Chişinău. Lokel tok ples bilong dispela ples em Romanian, tasol ol i save yusim Russian long planti hap.
English: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel, ol sitisen bilong America long Middle East em ol bai i stap long narapela we long ol lain long Europe na ol Arab.
English: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
Tok Pisin: Pret bilong no gat trenspot (transport) i mekim na i luk olsem dispela geim (game) em ol bai i pilai insait long wanpela hap we i no gat sapota i ken i go.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela ol nupela teknoloji we i kamap i helpim mipela long lukim na mekim investigesen long ol straksa (structure) na proses (process) bilong brein (brain) we mipela i no bin lukim bipo.
predictions: Bikpela kamap bilong ol niupela teknoloji i givim yumi sans long lukim na skelim ol straksa na wok bilong brapela i nogat man i bin lukim bipo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
Tok Pisin: 'Segregation' na 'recombination' i save mekim dispela 'variation' i go i kam namel long tupela 'pool' insait long wanwan 'generation'.
English: The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755.
Tok Pisin: Ol Portuguese i bin bagarapim em na bildim em gen aninit long nem Casa Branca, tasol ol i lusim dispela ples bihain long wanpela guria i kamap long 1755.
English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
Tok Pisin: Long Tonga, no gat ripot bilong bikpela bagarap i kamap long ol samting o long ol manmeri, tasol i no gat pawa bilong lait, na dispela i mekim na ol atoriti long Tonga i no bin kisim tok lukaut bilong tsunami we PTWC i bin salim.
English: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong gavman bilong narapela kantri long luksave long ol dispela dokumen em i narakain narakain tu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: This provides us with a lot of information and material to build simulation models which help us to understand processes in our mind.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela i save givim mipela nupela infomesen na meteriel long kamapim ol 'simulation model' we i ken helpim yumi long klia gut long ol proses (process) we i save kamap insait long tingting bilong mipela.
predictions: Dispela i givim mipela planti save na ol samting bilong wokim ol model bilong simulaten, we i helpim mipela long save long ol wok insait long tingting bilong mipela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
Tok Pisin: Long 1683, ol soldia bilong Qing dynasty (1644-1912) i holimpasim na kisim 'western' na 'northern' nambis eria bilong Taiwan na tokaut olsem Taiwan em i wanpela provins bilong Qing Empire long 1885.
English: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem olgeta South African National Parks, i gat 'conservation' na 'entry fee' bilong wanwan de long ol park.
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.
English: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long Paris i gat nem long soim pasin we i no gutpela kain olsem tingim ol yet, i no mekim gutpela pasin, ting olsem ol i impoten moa long ol narapela.
English: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
Tok Pisin: Ol namba wan 'case' bilong dispela sik long dispela sisen (season) em ol i bin ripotim long arere bilong Julai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Maski AI em i mekim ol lain i tingim 'science fiction', AI em i kamapim wanpela impoten eria insait long 'computer science', em i save mekim wok long sait bilong pasin, lainim samting, mekim senis insait long wanpela masin.
predictions: Maski AI i gat bikpela nem long ol stori bilong 'science fiction', AI em i wanpela bikpela hap bilong 'computer science', we i wok long lukluk long pasin, lainim samting, na smat senis insait long masin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
Tok Pisin: Ol saintis i ting olsem ol 'ocelot' i save bihainim na painim ol narapela animal long kaikai (traim long kaikai) taim ol i smelim samting, ol i kisim smel bilong ol long wanem hap ol i bin i stap long em long graun.
English: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
Tok Pisin: Paralympics bai i kamap long 24 Ogas i go long 5 Septemba 2021. Sampela ol samting bai kamap long ol narapela lokesen long ol narapela ples long Japan.
English: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela 'adoption', ol papamama we i kamapim dispela pikinini bai stopim 'right' bilong olsem ol papamama na narapela marit i ken lukautim dispela pikinini.
English: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Dispela park i karamapim 19,500 km² na em i bruk i go long 14-pela 'ecozone', wanwan bilong ol i sapotim narakain narakain 'wildlfie'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Risets insait long AI em i wok bilong mekim masin i mekim ol wok we i save kamap olgeta taim na i nidim save bilong wanpela wok long mekim disisen.
predictions: Risets long AI i wok long wokim ol masin bilong mekim ol wok we i nidim tingting bilong save.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, ol i save makim ol ‘route’ we planti lain i save go wokabaut o ‘cycling’ long em.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
Tok Pisin: Mi no save sapos yu luksave long dispela o nogat, tasol planti bilong ol kago i kam long Central America i kam insait long kantri 'duty-free'.
English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Tok Pisin: Ol meme bilong we ol man i save lukautim em ol i save putim ol long grup we i save raun long ol liklik maunten o ol narapela hap bilong kaikai, planti taim ol 'goatherd' i save was long ol na dispela em ol pikinini ol bikpela man we ol i save kolim olsem 'sheperd'. Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.
English: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol 'cruise' i save tok olsem ol i karim ol lain i go long Berlin, Germany insait long ol 'brochure' bilong ol. Olsem yu ken lukim long mep (map) i stap antap Berlin i no stap klostu long solwara na wanpela visit long siti em i no stap insait long prais bilong 'cruise'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol pasin bilong intanet i save givim nupela save long wanem we yumi ken yusim ‌intanet na kisim amamas.
English: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
Tok Pisin: Long ol Springboks, em i pinis bilong 5-pela gem we ol i lus i kam inap nau.
English: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
Tok Pisin: Bikos i no gat bekim i kamap long dispela 'tactic', Germany i ting olsem wankain samting bai i kamap long ol 'submarine' bilong em.
English: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'city-states' em ol samting we i save kamapim wanpela kantri. Insait long wanpela 'civilizational culture' em ol lain i save givim save bilong ol i go long sampela 'generation', wanpela kain 'footprint' bilong kalsa we i save stap na rot bilong givim save long ol narapela.
English: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
Tok Pisin: Bihain, Lakkha Singh i go pas long singim ol bhajan.

predictions: Ol dispela kain samting i kamap ol arapela save long en, we i putim tingting long givim ol rot bilong stretim ol hevi bilong laip tru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This type of manager has difficulty making unpopular decisions, performing disciplinary action, performance evaluations, assigning responsibility, and holding people accountable.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain meneja em i save painim hat long mekim ol disisen we ol lain i no laikim, givim mekim save long ol lain i brukim lo, sekim wok pefomens (performance) bilong ol wokmanmeri, givim wok long ol wokmanmeri, na tokaut stret long ol wokmanmeri olsem ol i mekim rong.
English: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol distrik em planti ol Japanese Coaster Buses i save ron long en, na yu bai sindaun gut.
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela eria longwe long not em i no gat planti manmeri na sampela ples we i no gat manmeri long en.
English: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
Tok Pisin: Faivepela minit bilong dispela 'display' na wanpela win i stat long blo, wanpela minit bihain, dispela win i kamap long mak bilong 70km/h... orait ren i kam, tasol em i pundaun strong nogut tru na sais bilong em i bikpela tru na em i paitim skin bilong yu olsem wanpela nidel (needle), orait bihain ais i pundaun olsem ston long skai, ol manmeri i pret na singaut na ran antap long wanpela narapela.
English: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'subculture' i save mekim ol lain i gat wankain tingting na i pilim olsem ol stendet bilong 'society' i no bilong ol na taim ol i bung wantaim ol i kamapim wanpela 'identity' bilong ol yet.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Nau ol i save yusim dispela AI sistem insait long ol eria bilong 'economics', 'medecine', 'engineering' na 'military', na ol i bin yusim em long bildim sampela komputa bilong haus na 'video game software applications'.
predictions: AI sistem nau i save yusim planti long ol eria bilong ikonomi, marasin, enjinia, na ami, olsem ol i bin wokim long sampela kompiuta bilong haus na ol aplikasen bilong video gem.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common.
Tok Pisin: Montevideo em i stap insait long 'subtropic'; insait long ol mun bilong sama (summer), tempritsa (temperature) bilong em i save stap antap long +30°C.
English: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, pesentes (percentage) bilong XDR-TB insait long wanpela grup manmeri wantaim sik 'tuberculosis' i stap daunbilo' 60,00 bilong 330,00 manmeri i save kisim dispela sik long wanpela taim insait long South Africa.
English: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
Tok Pisin: I no longtaim bihain long Alonso Michael Schumacher i pinis long resis, bikos 'saspension' bilong em i bagarap taim em i wok long pait long winim spes insait long resis.
English: Smaller tournaments and matches can also be seen here at other times of the year.
Tok Pisin: Ol liklik tonamen (tournament) na geim (game) em lain i ken lukim long hia tu long foapela taim long wanpela yia.
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.

label: Ol 'field trip' em ol i impoten pat bilong ol klasrum. Planti taim tisa i save laik long kisim ol sumatin bilong em i go long ol ples we ol i no inap long kalap long bas (bus) na i go.
predictions: Fild trip em i bikpela hap bilong olgeta klasrum. Planti taim wanpela tisa i laik bringim ol sumatin bilong em i go long ol ples we bas trip em i no inap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
Tok Pisin: House Speaker bilong bipo Newt Gingrich, gavana bilong Texas Rick Perry, na Congresswoman Michele Bachmann i pinis namba foa, faiv na siks.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
English: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stopim ol raun bilong ol bihain long 'lead singer' bilong ol Steven Tyler i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong em taim em i pundaun i kamdaun long 'stage' taim em i wok long singsing long Ogas 5.
English: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, i gat sampela bas (bus) i save go long hap not long Hebron, dispela em i ples we ol i planim ol papa bilong bilip insait long Baibel Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, na ol meri bilong ol.
English: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
Tok Pisin: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.

English: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Teknoloji (technology) i givim ansa wantaim 'field trip' we i kamap long komputa. Ol sumating i ken lukluk long ol 'museum artifact', lukim wanpela 'aquarium', ol lukluk long wanpela naispela 'art' taim ol i sindaun insait long klas.
predictions: Teknoloji i givim rot bilong mekim ol virtual ples raun. Ol sumatin inap lukluk long ol samting bilong musium, go lukim ol pis insait long akwarium, o amamas long lukim ol naispela at wok taim ol i sindaun wantaim kelas bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
Tok Pisin: Dispela "'up bow" mark' i luk olsem wanpela V na dispela "'down bow mark'" i luk olsem wanpela 'staple' o wanpela 'square' i no gat aninit sait bilong em.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Tok Pisin: 34 pesen (percent) bilong ol lain insait long dispela 'poll' i gat dispela tingting, we ol i laik olsem Queen Elizabeth II i mas kamap laspela kwin bilong Australia.
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Tok Pisin: Ol wok bilong painim dispela hap we 'crash' i kamap i bin bungim weda (weather) nogut na ples we i hat long man i go long en.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Tok Pisin: Long olpela Medina em i isi long painim ol ples we i save salim ol samting bilong ol Morocco, kain olsem 'tagine', 'pottery', 'leather goods', 'hookahs', na ol kainkain 'geegaws', tasol olgeta dispela samting em i bilong ol turis long baim.
English: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.
Tok Pisin: Antap bilong Moon em i gat ol ston na das (dust). 'Outer layer' bilong Moon em ol i kolim 'crust'.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis, wanpela komisen (commission) bilong presiden i mekim rekomendesen (recommendation) olsem CEP bilong bipo i mas risain (resign) olsem wanpela hap wok bilong kantri i muv i go long ol nupela ileksen.
English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol metod (method) we planti lain i save yusim long soim olsem 'socialization' em i impoten em ol i save yusim stori bilong ol pikinini we i bin 'socialized' bikos ol papamama i no bisi long ol, ol samting nogut i kamap long laip bilong ol, o ol lain i mekim nogut long ol taim ol i wok long gro.
English: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
Tok Pisin: Ol Safari em ating ol i nambawan samting we i save kisim ol turis i go long Africa na ol i bikpela samting long planti ol visita.
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait, wanpela meneja i senis i go na kamap olsem wanpela man o meri we ol lain i bo save long em na em i pilim olsem em i mas senisim olgeta samting we tim i wok long mekim na mekim olgeta samting long strong bilong ol yet.
English: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol dispela plen (plan) i bagarap long dispela nait, moa long 800,000 soldia bilong Rrd Army bilong Soviet Union i go insait na i kamapim wanpela 'front' long Belarus na wanpela 'front' long Ukraine bihain long ol i go insait na holimpasim ol 'eastern region' bilong Poland na dispela pasin em i no bihaibim Riga Peace Treaty, Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, na ol narapela intanesinel agrimen (agreement) we i kamap namel long tupela kantri na tu, i kamap namel long planti narapela kantri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.
predictions: Duty free shopping em i sans bilong baim ol samting we i no gat takis na eksais long ol sampela ples.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.
English: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
Tok Pisin: Schengen zone, em i narakain, sampela taim em i save stap olsem wanpela kantri bilong em yet.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save yusim wanpela jaient 'rocket' we longpela bilong em i winim 100 'feet' long putim wanpela 'telescope' long 'space'.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol travela we i go long kantri we i gat bikpela takis sampela taim ol i ken seivim (save) bikpela mani, ol i ken seivim long ol prodak taim olsem ol 'alcoholic beverages' na 'tobacco'.
predictions: Ol manmeri i go long ol kantri we i gat bikpela takis inap seivim planti mani, tru tumas long ol samting olsem alkohol na tambu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'travel agent' i save givim ol offer' we i gat brekfas (breakfast), kar bilong kisim yu i go i kam long eapot o bungim tu ol prais bilong balus tiket na prais bilong hotel.
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
Tok Pisin: I bin no gat ol bikpela bus insait long graun bilong ol Canaan, olsem na plang em i ekspensif (expensive) tumas.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela spes namel long Point Marion na Fairmont em i ol nambawan hatpela kondisen bilong draiv long Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, planti taim em i go insait long ol ples we i no gat planti lain na i stap longwe.
predictions: Stret namel long Point Marion na Fairmont i soim ol pasin draiv i hatpela tru long Buffalo-Pittsburgh Hailwe, planti taim em i pas long ol ples i stap isi na bus i karamapim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, taim yu go lukim ol kasol (castle) insait long Loire Valley, Rhine valley o kisim wanpela ‘cruise’ i go long ol naispela siti long Danube o ‘boating’ long Erie Canal.
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
Tok Pisin: Long 1994, dispela kros na pait i bin mekim na wanpela kantri ol i kolim Transnistria Republic i kamap long 'eastern' Moldova, we i gat gavman na karensi (currency) bilong em yet, tasol ol i no luksave long em olsem wanpela UN memba kantri.
English: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.
Tok Pisin: Long wankain taim, 'navy' bilong Germany, i yusim ol U-boat, na i wok long traim long stopim dispela long kamap.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
predictions: Sapos yu no save draiv gut long ol rot bilong ples, yu mas lukaut gut: ol bikpela kalap, liklik rot, na strongpela kona i save planti.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan taim ol i ritim dispela dokumen long pablik em John Nixon i ritim autsait long Independence Hall long Julai 8.
English: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
Tok Pisin: Gutpela sindaun insait long wok ples em i bikpela samting, na ol i laikim grup wok na i no pasin bilong tok amamas long samting we wanpela wokman i mekim.
English: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save mekim planti raun i go long ol rip long olgeta taim insait long wanpela yia, na bagarap i kamap long bodi long ol dispela kain samting i save kamap wanwan taim tasol.
English: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
Tok Pisin: Narapela opsen (option) bilong 'biorhythm-based' em bai yu dringim planti wara (kain olsem wara o ti, wanpela 'diuretic') bipo long yu slip, dispela bai fosim yu long kirap na i go pispis.
English: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
Tok Pisin: Long hap, ol i painim bodi bilong Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, i karamap long ol blanket we blut i pas long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
predictions: Ol mak bilong spid i stap daun tru winim ol bipo na bihain hap — planti taim 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na strongpela bihainim bilong ol dispela mak em i moa impotant tru winim ol arapela taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Tok Pisin: Maski Winfrey i wok long krai long taim ol i tok gutbai long em, em i tokaut klia long ol lain i save laik long lukim em olsem em bai i kam bek.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i min olsem yu ken lukim siti we i gat histori bilong en long sampela de taim yu kam bek long nait na slip long sip.
English: In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands.
Tok Pisin: Long 1990, ol i putim em i go long lista bilong 'world heritage sites' we i stap long mak nogut, bikos long bagarap i kamap long ol wesan bilong em long deset (desert).
English: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'outbreak' i mekim na gavman bilong India i mekim ol dispela samting kain olsem salim ol lain bilong holimpasim pik i go long ol eria we planti pik i sik na i stap, na givim tausen moskito keten (curtain) na spreyim (spray) ol 'pesticide'.

English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.
predictions: Tasol, samting i givim tingting, olsem, sevis bilong mobail fon i gat strongpela signal moa long hia winim planti narapela hap long rot, olsem long bus bilong Pennsylvania Wilds.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
Tok Pisin: Plis soim bikpela rispek long dispela ples. No ken mekim ol tok pilai long Holocaust o Nazis.
English: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ripot i tok olsem namba bilong ol lain i dai em i et, na ripot i kam long ol ofis i tok olsem 30-pela lain i kisim bagarap; tasol tru tru namba em ol i no save yet.
English: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
Tok Pisin: Lo bilong France long ileksen i tok olsem ol i mas putim ol 'code' long ol dispela wok bilong makim kendidet.
English: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan namel long 78-pela rekomendesen (recommendation) em i olsem i mas i gat wanpela nupela 'diplomatic initiative' bipo long dispela yia i pinis long mekim ol boda bilong Iraq i stap seif long ol birua na kamapim ol gutpela rilesensip wantaim ol lain i stap klostu long em.

predictions: Ol bret na kek bilong ol Jemani i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat planti kain na naispela, olsem ol i stap long saut sait neba bilong ol, Austria.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.
Tok Pisin: Tibetan Buddhism em i bihainim ol samting we Buddha i tisim, tasol ol i mekim em i go bikpela moa wantaim 'mahayana path of love' na tu wantaim planti ol teknik (technique) bilong Indian Yoga.
English: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela eksampel we i kamap i no longtaim em dispela kempen (campaign) bilong North Altlantic long WWII. Ol America i wok long traim long muvim ol kago na ol man long Atlantic Ocean long helpim ol Britain.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.
English: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela yia, wanpela man o meri we i sik wantaim dispela binatang i ken givim dispela sik i go long 10 o 15-pela lain we i save stap klostu long ol.
