English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).
predictions: Ol 'fruit pastries' i save stap planti, wantaim apel ol i kukim insait long 'pastries' olgeta yia, na seri wantaim pram i kamap long taim bilong sumatin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut bilong wanwan rijen o sisen em ol 'blizzard', 'snowstorm', 'ice storm', na 'dust storm'.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim vidio rekoding i mekim na ol saveman i painimaut long ol impoten samting long sait bilong mining bilong 'micro-expression', ol muvmen bilong pes we i save kamap insait long sampela 'millisecond'.
English: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
Tok Pisin: Nambawan lokel bia em 'Number One', em i no wanpela narakain bia, tasol em i nais na i mekim man i pilim gut. Wanpela narapela lokel bia em i "Manta".
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Planti bilong ol kaikai bilong ol German i save gat ol 'almond', 'hazelnut', na ol narapela 'nut'. Ol keik (cake) we planti lain i save long en em i save go gut wantaim wanpela strongpela kap kofi.
predictions: Planti bret na kek bilong ol Jemani tu i save gat ol almond, hazelnut, na ol arapela kaikai bilong diwai nut. Ol popula kek i save pair gut tru wantaim wanpela kap bilong strongpela kopi.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas lukaut long no ken larim laplap i kamap hot tumas (dispela i ken kamapim mekim klos i kamap liklik, o sapos em i hot tumas, klos bai i paia).
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
Tok Pisin: Romanticicm i bin gat wanpela bikpela hap tingting bilong 'cultural determinism' insait long em, dispela tingting em i kam long 'writer' olsem Goethe, Fichte, na Schlegel.
English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol nupela teknoloji we i kamap i helpim mipela long lukim na mekim investigesen long ol straksa (structure) na proses (process) bilong brein (brain) we mipela i no bin lukim bipo.
English: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
Tok Pisin: Sapos ol Allies i no mekim samting ol i bin mekim, Germany ating bai holimpasim na kisim Britain olsem em i bin mekim long olgeta hap bilong Europe.
English: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu bin i go long narapela kantri long namba wan taim tru, yu bin isi na traim long lainim samting, yu save olsem ol travela i stap long narapela kantri i mas senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol.
English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu go long wanpela gaden we ol i stretim bilong ol lalin i kam na lukim, pasin bilong kolektim ol "'specimen’" bai mekim na ol i rausim yu, na ol i no inap toktok planti.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.
predictions: Kari em i kaikai em ol i wokim long ol kainkain gras na spais, wantaim mit o ol liklik kaikai.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'peacekeepers' bilong UN, husat i bin kam long Haiti bihain long bikpela guria bilong yia 2010, em ol lain i sutim tok long ol olsem ol i mekim dispela sik i go long ol manmeri na dispela sik i stat klostu long kem bilong ol.
English: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.

Tok Pisin: Danielle Lantagne, em i wanpela savemeri bilong UN long sait bilong sik, em i tok olsem dispela sik i mas stat wantaim ol 'peacekeepers'.

English: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'foster care' i sapos long givim olgeta samting we ol i no bin gat long haus we ol i kisim ol long en.

Tok Pisin: Em i klostu long hat olgeta long senisim karensi (currency) bilong Falkland autsait long ol ailan, olsem na yu mas senisim mani bipo long yu lusim dispela ailan.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'Article' i nidim ol lain long tok orait long olgeta 'state' bipo long ol i ken mekim senis na ol 'state' i kisim 'central government' olsem na ol lain we ol i makim i no save stap.
